rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Vastu-aligned entrance with open space and natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area designed for joint family gatherings; windows on the east and north to maximize natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Separate dining space with views towards the garden area (eastern side) for auspicious energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient layout with Vastu considerations; placed in north-east corner of the ground floor to ensure prosperity and good health.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Located on the west side for a calm and serene sleeping environment, following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Ample space with proper ventilation; windows on the north for auspicious energy flow.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Dedicated family common area; located centrally to encourage unity and interaction.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: For storage, laundry; placed in south-east corner as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.details: Large entrance door with glass panels for natural light; aligned with east-west axis.
Large windows in living room and dining area to maximize morning sunlight.
Windows in master bedroom, family room ensuring air flow and auspicious energy.
Guest bedroom window for calm environment.
